column4: I got problems to run Beryl and I might thing is something with my ATI drivers, may somebody help me with this please?  http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/11390/
what driver do you use, and what is the error message from beryl?
well i installed the ATI drivers from the ubuntu help, fglrx and my beryl-manager is working but when i try to select the beryl windowmanager nothing happens
try running beryl-manager from a terminal, I run beryl perfectly with a Radeon 9200 mobile with the opensource radeon driver
my beryl-manager is running, I got the icon in my taskbar
I mean stop beryl-manager, and start it again from a terminal, then youll see a error message in the termaninal, when you try to select beryl
yes, then problem is when you do that DRI doesnt work anymore right?
It is a problem in the ATI driver.. I use the opensource radeon driver, and activate composite, and beryl is blazing
so i should remove that section from my xorg file?
you have to have composite and DRI enabled
